item.title: CentOS8编译安装MySQL 5.7.30
item.author: 作者
item.description: 环境 OS: CentOS 8.2 MySQL: 5.7.30 报错信息 1. 编译报错 CMake Error at plugin/group_replication/libmysqlgcs/rpcgen.cmake:100 (MESSAGE): Could not find rpcgen Call Stack (most recent call first): plugin/group_replication/libmysqlgcs/CMakeLists.txt:38 (INCLUDE) 解决方法 yum --enablerepo=PowerTools install rpcgen 2. systemctl start mysqld.service报错无法启动问题 报错信息
